fields.name: ace_event_number
fields.title: ACE event number
fields.description: unique number relating to the deployment of the CTD rosette during the expedition

fields.name: date_time [UTC]
fields.title: Date time
fields.description: start date and time of the CTD rosette deployment from which the samples were taken in ISO 8601 format YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss+00:00 [UTC]

fields.name: latitude [degN]
fields.title: Latitude
fields.description: latitude at which the CTD rosette deployment began [decimal degrees North]
fields.x_spi_cf_attribute: latitude at which the CTD rosette deployment began

fields.name: longitude [degE]
fields.title: Longitude
fields.description: longitude at which the CTD rosette deployment began [decimal degrees East]
fields.x_spi_cf_attribute: longitude at which the CTD rosette deployment began

fields.name: depth [m]
fields.title: Depth
fields.description: depth below the surface from which the seawater sample was taken [m]
fields.x_spi_cf_attribute: depth below the surface from which the seawater sample was taken

fields.name: ace_sample_number
fields.title: ACE sample nunmber
fields.description: unique number of the seawater sample within the ACE in the format shipname/ACE/legnumber/projectnumber/julianday[UTC]/eventnumber/PIinitials/projectsamplenumber

fields.name: project_sample_number
fields.title: Project sample number
fields.description: unique number of the seawater sample within the project

fields.name: measurement_date [UTC]
fields.title: Measurement date
fields.description: date on which the measurements of biogenic silicate in the seawater sample were made in ISO 8601 format YYYY-MM-DD [UTC]

fields.name: concentration_of_biogenic_silicate [µmol/L]
fields.title: Concentration of biogenic silicate
fields.description: calculated concentration of biogenic silicate (Bsi) in the seawater sample [µmol/L]

fields.name: standard_deviation_of_biogenic_silicate_concentration [µmol/L]
fields.title: Standard deviation of biogenic silicate concentration
fields.description: standard deviation in the calculated concentration of biogenic silicate (Bsi) in the seawater sample [µmol/L]

fields.name: comments
fields.title: Comments
fields.description: relevant comments about the sampling or sample that may affect the results]
